name: Lucent
description:
Lucent is an audio exploratory game and was created during the Gamerella X Game jam in New York in Nov 2014. The theme of the Jam was “Boss Up”. Lucent addresses the theme through the exploration of a surreal environment, something that resembles a “Bathroom in space” as Seori (@edwardyaoihands) one of our teammates put it.

As you explore the level, you discover musical sound bytes. Once a piece of music is acquired it integrates into the overall game soundtrack, just like the experiences you encounter in everyday life shape who you are.

@cosmoddd - Music, Sound mixing and Main Level Designer

@irimaya - Production and UI graphics

@SnowHydra- Programming and Special Effects

@ChaoticFormula - Game Design and Animation

@edwardyaoihands - Sound Effects and assistant Level Designer
